resources.string: As gyanoday is a well known facilitator of Sainik Schools and other reputed schools like this.It has been constantly running in an integrated process of learning, overall development and unlocking hidden potential of a child. "Gyanoday is having a never giving up attitude being associated with all acedamic gurus and thinkers."
There are many other activities performed like Physical training to every students who live in hostel in the morning, Games in the evening in the supervision of expert teachers.
